item.description:
I love to walk for exercise and conversation, and would like to schedule a walk July 7. We could walk through the Crosstown Trails in Wellesley, and meet in the parking lot of the Wellesley library, near the back door of the library. The Wellesley library is opposite Town Hall in Wellesley MA, near Central St.

Please note: due to warm weather expected Saturday, will change the walk to 9:30am.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: walk for exercise and good conversation
